Question
========
We use an ANOVA model with two factors (i.e., a two-way ANOVA) in a balanced experimental design. Complete the following sentence: "The predictors are ..., and the sums of squares ... overlap."

Answerlist
----------
* Dependent; do.
* Dependent; do not.
* Independent; do.
* Independent; do not.
